Title: Relates to requiring municipalities, authorities and agencies to obtain liability insurance on each duly appointed police officer
Summary: Relates to requiring municipalities, authorities and agencies to obtain liability insurance on each duly appointed police officer in an amount not less than $200,000.
LawCode: Add ยง52-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring municipalities, authorities and agencies to obtain liability insurance on each duly appointed police officer
